title: Four-paneled folding screen
marks:
Inscription

LRC, printed on \"tag\" attached to h
description: four-fold screen/room divider; white ground and white on back; decorated with multicolored printed designs in four rows of musical instruments (primarily lutes), whips, umbrellas, canes, boots, guns, boating equipment (paddles, ropes, anchor), antique lamps, two hat trees with various hats, and keys; eight white casters
